title: Torchbearer Sauces Slaughter Sauce - 5 oz
features: You will receive (1) one 5 oz bottle of Slaughter Sauce
Perfect for BBQ chicken, Rice and hot dogs.

This Slaughter Sauce combines Habenero Peppers, Mandarin Oranges, Carrots, Onions, Tomatoes, Vinegar, Garlic, Sugar, and other all-natural spices to create a strong flavor that is spicy and satisfying.
All Natural, Vegan, Extract-Free, Made in USA!
description: For those who revel in the slow burn, this baby has 67,582 scoville units of all habanero flavors. With a sweet first impression, it's been known to take up to five minutes to feel the full effect. So be kind to yourself and try some slaughter sauce right away, but just try not to get burned too badly.
